/* 렌탈CB 연체이력 조회 */ SELECT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', T2.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , X.DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , X.DLQ_BLAM - (SELECT SUM(NVL(RVE_AMT,0)) FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL /*T:수납상세*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND RVE_PROCS_YN = 'Y' /*수납처리여부*/ AND DP_DV_CD = '1' /*입금구분코드-1:입금*/ AND DP_MES_CD IN ('01','02') /*입금수단코드-01:현금,02:신용카드*/ AND (RVE_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),1),'YYYYMM')||'01' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),1),'YYYYMM')||LPAD(T4.MPY_BSDT,2,'0')) ) AS DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND OG_TP_CD = 'BND' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T5.FWBOO_DTM,1,8),'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ , X.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , (SELECT BIL_YM||NVL(FNT_STPL_D,'00') FROM (SELECT BIL_YM , FNT_STPL_D , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BIL_PLAN_SN DESC) RN FROM TB_RVCL_BIL_PLAN_BAS WHERE 1 = 1 AND BIL_YM = #{baseYm} AND CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') WHERE RN = 1) AS FNT_STPL_DT /*납입기한일자*/ , SUBSTR(T5.FWBOO_DTM,1,8) AS MSG_FW_DT /*알림톡발송일자*/ , (SELECT (CASE WHEN RESULT = '1000' THEN 'Y' WHEN RESULT != '1000' THEN 'N' ELSE '' END) FROM ATA_MMT_LOG S1 /*T:알림톡전송이력*/ WHERE S1.MT_PR = T6.MT_PR AND MT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(MT_SEQ) FROM ATA_MMT_LOG WHERE MT_PR = S1.MT_PR)) AS RESULT_YN /*성공여부*/ , X.NICE_FW_DT /*나이스발송일자*/ FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) AS OC_BSYM /*발생기준년월*/ , A.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , A.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ , A.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , A.NICE_FW_DT /*나이스발송일자*/ , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_AMT,0)) AS DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_BLAM,0)) AS DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ A /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B /*T:고객기본*/ ON B.CST_NO = A.CST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND LPAD(A.DLQ_BLAM,0) > 0 /*연체잔액*/ AND A.NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y' /*알림발송대상여부*/ AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' /*발생기준일자*/
AND A.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = A.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_OJ_TP_CD = '01' /*연락제외대상유형코드-01:고객번호*/ AND CTNT_EXCD_MEDI_TP_CD IN ('02','03') /*연락제외매체유형코드-02:문자,03:알림톡*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/ GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) , A.CST_NO , A.NOTY_TRS_DT , A.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN , A.NICE_FW_DT ) X INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS WHERE BND_BIZ_DV_CD IN ('L21') /*채권업무구분코드-L21:리스*/ ) T3 /*T:채권계약기본*/ ON T3.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T4 /*T:계약결제기본*/ ON T4.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T4.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'E' /*채권알림톡업무코드-E:등록관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T5 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T5.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/ ) T6 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T6.RESERVED3 = T5.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T6.RESERVED1 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED2 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED5 = T5.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: /* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 - 저장(이력) */ INSERT INTO TB_CBBO_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_HIST ( /*T:렌탈CB연체이력*/ CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , HIST_CH_DTM /*이력변경일시*/ , CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD /*렌탈CB등록구분코드*/ , DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , FST_OC_DT /*최초발생일자*/ , OC_BSDT /*발생기준일자*/ , OC_CRT_DT /*발생생성일자*/ , OC_FILE_CRT_DT /*발생파일생성일자*/ , CHG_FILE_CRT_DT /*변동파일생성일자*/ , RLS_FILE_CRT_DT /*해제파일생성일자*/ , BF_RLS_DT /*이전해제일자*/ , RLS_DT /*해제일자*/ , DL_DT /*삭제일자*/ , CLCTAM_OG_TP_CD /*집금조직유형코드*/ , CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금파트너번호*/ , NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , NOTY_FW_OJ_YN /*알림발송대상여부*/ , NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_DT /*알림수신일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_YN /*알림수신여부*/ , NOTAK_RS_CD /*알림톡결과코드*/ , SMS_FW_RCV_STAT_CD /*SMS발송수신상태코드*/ , DTA_DL_YN /*데이터삭제여부*/ ) SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') , CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD /*렌탈CB등록구분코드*/ , DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , FST_OC_DT /*최초발생일자*/ , OC_BSDT /*발생기준일자*/ , OC_CRT_DT /*발생생성일자*/ , OC_FILE_CRT_DT /*발생파일생성일자*/ , CHG_FILE_CRT_DT /*변동파일생성일자*/ , RLS_FILE_CRT_DT /*해제파일생성일자*/ , BF_RLS_DT /*이전해제일자*/ , RLS_DT /*해제일자*/ , DL_DT /*삭제일자*/ , CLCTAM_OG_TP_CD /*집금조직유형코드*/ , CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금파트너번호*/ , NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , NOTY_FW_OJ_YN /*알림발송대상여부*/ , NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_DT /*알림수신일자*/ , NOTY_RCV_YN /*알림수신여부*/ , NOTAK_RS_CD /*알림톡결과코드*/ , SMS_FW_RCV_STAT_CD /*SMS발송수신상태코드*/ , DTA_DL_YN /*데이터삭제여부*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%'
mapper.update: /* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 - 알림톡 전송일자 갱신 */ UPDATE TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ SET NOTY_TRS_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE 1 = 1 AND CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND OC_BSDT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'%' AND NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y' AND NICE_FW_EXCD_YN = 'N' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
